text: Stigmaeidae is a family of prostigs in the order Trombidiformes. There are about 14 genera and at least 50 described species in Stigmaeidae. ==Genera== * Agistemus * Cheylostigmaeus * Eryngiopus * Eustigmaeus * Ledermuelleria * Ledermuelleriopsis * Mediolata * Mullederia * Primagistemus * Pseudostigmaeus * Stigmaeus * Storchia * Summersiella * Zetzellia ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Raphignathoidea
title: Stigmaeidae
